{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
    <PUBLISHER_NOTE>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib ist zu haben:</PUBLISHER_NOTE>
    <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Johann Arnds</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Passions- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>fl. 2.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>24. kr.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Stahiii</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE>
        <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>
        <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>fl. 1. 30. kr.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Nouvelle Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>32. kr.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Maiers der Geistl.</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Kranken Geistl. oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>48. kr.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Hauß-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>
        <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>
        <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>40. kr.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"The input was a JSON string containing an XML snippet. I corrected several issues: 1. The surrounding JSON structure was removed, and the XML was validated. 2. Obvious character/encoding errors (like '\u221a\u2020' for '†' or bad umlauts) were normalized to standard text ('†' removed as likely artifact, umlauts corrected: 'Pa\u221a\u00fcions' -> 'Passions', 'Hau\u221a\u00fc-Gebett-Buch' -> 'Hauß-Gebett-Buch'). 3. The initial descriptive text 'Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib ist zu haben:' was wrapped in a semantic <PUBLISHER_NOTE> tag, as it is not part of the book data itself. 4. XML entities for '&' were corrected (&). 5. <PRIZE> tags were uniformly changed to the more standard <PRICE> tag for consistency, though this varies by specific schema (I standardized based on the third entry). 6. Several tags were missing closing slashes or were improperly nested/closed (e.g., fixing formatting around prices and symbols). 7. Whitespace/newlines were added for readability."}
